text: No one likes having a fever (发烧). Learn some other key words such as hospital (医院) in today’s beginner reading.今天早上，我发烧了，就去了医院。我坐在医院的椅子上，等医生看病。I had a fever this morning and went to the hospital. I sat in the hospital chair and waited for the doctor to see me.An old woman asked me if I came to the hospital by myself. I said, “Yes.”She gave me bread and a glass of water.
